title: Create a Cool Look This Season with These Perfect Pieces - WSJ.com
text: Create a Cool Look This Season with These Perfect Pieces From bold prints to head-to-toe leather, you can't go wrong with these memorable looks. Photography by Josh Olins; Styling by Ludivine Poiblanc Scroll SKIRTING ISSUESLong hems add kick to a seasonal wardrobe. Saskia de Brauw in Loewe top, $1,350, and skirt, $2,150, similar styles available at loewe​.com, and sneakers, $650, loewe​.com. Adut Akech in Céline jacket, $3,400, skirt, $3,400, and shoes, $990, Céline, 67 Wooster Street, New York, and brooch, $680, fortyfiveten​.com. CARTOON PLANET Wear a whimsical wonder straight from the runway. Jing Wen in Comme des Garçons coat, jacket, and dress, price and availability upon request at Comme des Garçons, 520 West 22nd Street, New York, shoes, $460, and socks, $35, Comme des Garçons, 520 West 22nd Street, New York. Kiki Willems in Prada coat, $4,870, shirtdress, $1,020, and bag, $2,850, select Prada boutiques. WELL SUITED A dramatic heel heightens the mood. Versace jacket, $2,400, top, $895, skirt, $875, leggings, $295, and belt, $2,195, select Versace stores and Rupert Sanderson shoes, $585, rupertsanderson​.com. Calvin Klein 205W39NYC coat, $1,900, dress, $1,800, and shoes, $1,095, Calvin Klein, 654 Madison Avenue, New York. Lily Nova in Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello top, price upon request, and pants, $2,750, Saint Laurent, 3 East 57th Street, New York. HIGH CONTRAST Emanate strength in black and white. Gucci jacket, $4,980, shirt, $980, tie, $210, and pants, $3,300, gucci​.com and Chloé boots, price upon request, similar styles available at chloe​.com. RIGHT ANGLES Big checks (and a bare midriff) make for cheeky chic. Adesuwa Aighewi in Burberry coat, $2,590, top, $450, pants, $490, and bag, $1,450, us.burberry​.com, Céline earrings, $1,650, and shoes, $990, Céline, 67 Wooster Street, New York. J.W. Anderson dress, $1,640, barneys​.com. SHINE ON Head-to-toe leather or silk is a smooth move. Chanel coat, $18,700, select Chanel boutiques nationwide, Gucci pants, $3,300, gucci​.com, Wing & Weft gloves, $325, wingweftgloves​.com and Céline shoes, $880, Céline, 67 Wooster Street, New York. Léa Julian in Giorgio Armani jacket, $2,895, and pants, $2,895, Giorgio Armani boutiques nationwide and Ralph Lauren Collection shirt, $650, select Ralph Lauren stores. Models, Saskia de Brauw at DNA Models, Adut Akech and Léa Julian at The Society Management, Kiki Willems and Lily Nova at IMG Models, Jing Wen at Women Management and Adesuwa Aighewi at Silent Models; hair, Tomo Jidai; makeup, Sally Branka; manicure, Eri Handa; set design, Kadu Lennox.
